title: Lookin for a Duo to climb to Gold+ with (a MID/ADC would be ideal)
body:
Hey all. I am looking for a competent person, or people, to Duo (or Dynamic) Ranked with

My roles are:
Main - Jungle
Secondary - Top
(so ideally you will be a mid/ADC) I say mid/ADC because it seems like if duo with someone who has one of the same roles as me (jungle or top) we usually end up getting autofilled

My availability is: Monday - Friday 7PM to 11PM (Mountain time) and free basically any time on weekends.

replies.body: if you want we can try
Hey bud, I am silver 2 adc main with mid secondary. Would love a duo partner for ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=OUZO,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=miOxPs43,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-02-20T05:23:10.514+0000)
>
> Hey bud, I am silver 2 adc main with mid secondary. Would love a duo partner for ranked.

I finished Gold 4 last year.
im a gold 5 rn and i main mid/top
Im an ADC Main and im bronze on ranked duo and nothing yet on flex I need someone to play with me too.

> [{quoted}](name=JordanStormTK,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=miOxPs43,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-19T15:14:36.238+0000)
>
> Im an ADC Main and im bronze on ranked duo and nothing yet on flex I need someone to play with me too.

uh... couple things..    one.. it doesnt look like you play much ranked.. and 2... bronze 1-ish is fine, because then it would be easy to get out of.. but Bronze 5.. no thanks..
